title: As a BOC User, I want to edit a Domestic Amateur Player Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC ( test_boc_approver@mlb.com	/   solace27neutron )

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery++-+Amateur+Profile+-+Info+Tab
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing a Domestic Amateur Players profile
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Users with the correct permissions will see a grey Edit button when viewing a Dom Ama Player Profile
AND clicking Edit will reload the form in edit mode 
AND Save (grey) button will appear in place of the Edit button (no edit button displayed in edit mode).
AND Editable fields will match what is in the provided Data Discovery (Note the special behaviors)

title: As a BOC User, I want to Save a Domestic Amateur Player Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery++-+Amateur+Profile+-+Info+Tab
custom_steps: WHEN user Edits a Domestic Amateur Player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN a Save button will be available anytime the form is in edit mode. 
AND Clicking Save will run a required field and formatting check. 
AND If the required field and format check passes, then the current values are stored, and the system reloads the profile in view mode. 
AND After a successful save the system will display a successful save blue notification.
AND Whenever the form is in edit mode, the user will see a "Cancel" button on the form in grey.

title: As a BOC User, I want to Cancel a Domestic Amateur Player Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=info

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery++-+Amateur+Profile+-+Info+Tab
custom_steps: WHEN user is Editing a Domestic Players profile
custom_expected:
THEN clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes they have made. 
AND If they confirm the cancellation and the profile has been previously saved in the system, then the profile should be reloaded in view mode, with none of the edits that were made since the last save and up to the cancellation point reflected.
AND If they do not confirm the cancellation then the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

title: As a BOC User, I want to Approve a Consent Form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=consent_forms

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Consent+Form+Tracking+Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user is on the Admin tab and scrolls down to the Consent Forms Widget
custom_expected:
THEN AND On the Consent Form Tracking widget, there will be an Approve button as depicted in the attached wire
AND The button will only be active when a row's checkbox has been selected
AND Clicking Approve will remove the consent form from the widget and throw a blue notification "X consent forms successfully approved" (1 consent form, 2 consent forms)
AND In the player's R4 Draft History widget (on his profile), the Consent Status column will be updated to "Approved" and paperclip icon will be displayed
AND On the Club's Selectable Player widget, the Consent Required will display a paperclip icon
AND Clicking either paperclip icon will open the attached file

title: As a BOC User, I want to Reject a Consent Form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=consent_forms

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Consent+Form+Tracking+Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user is on the Admin tab and scrolls down to the Consent Forms Widget
custom_expected:
THE AND On the Consent Form Tracking widget, there will be a Reject button as depicted in the attached wire
AND The button will only be active when a row's checkbox has been selected
AND Clicking Reject will remove the consent form from the widget and throw a blue notification "X consent forms successfully rejected" (1 consent form, 2 consent forms)
AND In the player's R4 Draft History widget (on his profile), the Consent Status column will be updated to "Rejected" and the upload icon will be available again
AND On the Club's Selectable Player widget, the Consent Required column will return to displaying the upload icon

AND clicks Edit button
custom_expected:

AND The editable widget will match the provided data discovery and wire frame

AND Clicking Cancel on the tab will cancel changes made to the widget
AND More details on messages, etc., should be handled by prior stories

title: As a BOC User, I want to Approve a new school
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=school_profile

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+School+Profile
custom_steps: WHEN a School is submitted for approval, the BOC user can see the School in the Submitted Schools widget of the Rule 4 Admin screen
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking this item will open the Submitted School
AND The School will open in edit mode (this is where BOC school creation picks up)
AND There will be an Approve and Cancel button
AND Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes they have made. 
AND If they confirm the cancellation the screen will refresh, discarding any changes made, and return the user to their entry point
AND If they do not confirm the cancellation then the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.
AND Clicking Approve will run a required field check.  If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message. (Global error messaging, modal, pinned errors, red highlight for missing required fields)
AND Clicking Approve will run the school matching rule check (this story assumes there are no matches)
AND System reloads the profile in view mode, and displays a successful approve blue notification.

title: As a BOC User, I want to Edit a school
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=school_profile

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+School+Profile
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Rule 4 / Schools 
AND clicks on a school name
AND clicks Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN

EDIT
* An Edit(grey) button will be available anytime the form is in view mode if the viewing user has edit permissions for the form in its current state. 
* Clicking  Edit will reload the form in edit mode, and a Save(grey) button will appear in place of the Edit button (no edit button displayed in edit mode).
* Editable fields will match what is in the provided Data Discovery (Note the special behaviors)

SAVE
* A Save button will be available anytime an approved form is in edit mode. You can not save a new school as preliminary.
* Clicking Save will save the school and it's current values and reload the school in view mode. 
* Required field and format checks will only be run.
* The school status will not change from editing alone.  
* After a successful save the system will display a successful save blue notification. See Messages #77.
* Whenever the form is in edit mode, the user will see a "Cancel" button on the form in grey.


CANCEL
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes they have made. 
* If they confirm the cancellation and the form has not yet been saved in the system, then the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to entry point of the school profile. 
* If they confirm the cancellation and the form has been previously saved in the system, then the form should be reloaded in View mode, with none of the edits that were made since the last save and up to the cancellation point reflected.
* If they do not confirm the cancellation then the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

title: As a BOC User, I want to Delete a school
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=school_profile

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+School+Profile
custom_steps: WHEN BOC User is viewing a School profile in edit mode, there will be a Delete button
custom_expected:
THEN Club Users will never see a Delete button on the school profiles
AND Clicking the Delete button will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the school 
AND If they confirm the deletion, the school's status will be updated to Deleted, the screen will refresh, and return the user to the school profile in view mode and throw a blue notification "School successfully deleted"
AND If they do not confirm the cancellation then the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.
AND Deleting a school will automatically mark it as Inactive

title: As a BOC User, I want to update a Player's R4 Status from the Domestic Amateur Players widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=domestic_amateur_players

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+BOC+Domestic+Amateur+Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Rule 4 / Admin
custom_expected:
THEN There will be an "Update Status" dropdown in the footer of the Domestic Amateur Widget, as depicted in the provided wire
AND The values in the drop down will be as follows:
  - Eligible
  - Not Eligible
  - Not Subject
  - Pending Eligible
  - Removed
  - Drafted
  - Passed Over
AND The dropdown will not become active unless at least one players checkbox is selected
AND Selecting a value from the dropdown will update the R4 Status for the all selected players to the selected status
AND The widget will refresh and a blue success message will be displayed

title: As a BOC User, I want to Export the Domestic Video Log to Excel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (Video log tab not clickable at this time)
**currently this has to be tested using the following log in test_ebis_user74@mlb.com / 8+bRING+tABLE*

Wire:
https://s8xnnx.axshare.com/#p=video_log_1

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Domestic+Video+Log+Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Scouting from left nav / Video Log
custom_expected:
THEN There will be a Export to Excel button on the video log widget as depicted by the wire
AND Clicking the button will create an Excel export and open it in Excel
AND The Excel file will match the attached example, **both in layout and formatting**
AND Note: There will be some blank columns included in the export that do not appear in the widget
 - Player Status for all players will be "AM"
 - Filename will be a concatenation of fields:
AND  The column should be populated with a concatenation of the Last Name, First Name, Position, and Taped columns. For example, if Joe Smith is a RHP who was filmed on 09/15/2017, the file name would be: "SMITH,JOE_RHP_091517."
AND Video By will be blank for now

title: As a BOC User, I want to clear the Domestic Video Log
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC (Video log tab not clickable at this time)
**currently this has to be tested using the following log in test_ebis_user74@mlb.com / 8+bRING+tABLE*

Wire:
https://s8xnnx.axshare.com/#p=video_log_1

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Domestic+Video+Log+Widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to Scouting on left side / Video Log
AND user clicks the Clear Log button
custom_expected:
THEN There will be a Clear Log button on the video log as depicted in the wire
AND Clicking the Clear Log button will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to clear the log (this is a permanent action and cannot be undone)
AND If they confirm the decision, all the information in the video log will be cleared and will not be retained by the system.  The video log will be saved and the system will display a blue success notificaiton("The Video Log has been cleared")
AND If they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

title: As a BOC User, I want to add a player to the Domestic Video Log
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
**Account to use is test_ebis_user74@mlb.com / 8+bRING+tABLE*

Wire:
https://s8xnnx.axshare.com/#p=video_log_1

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Domestic+Video+Log+Widget
custom_steps: WHEN on the Video Log Widget, click the Add Row button
custom_expected:
THEN On the video log widget, there will be an Add Row button as depicted in the attached wire
AND Clicking the button will add a row to the bottom of the widget
AND The widget will auto-scroll so the new row is in view
AND The widget will also auto-horizontal scroll so the Name field is in view and in focus.  
AND The new row will be in edit mode
AND The player's **Last Name** box will be an auto-complete with the same population as the Dom Ama quick search
AND Selecting a player from the auto-complete will populate all the appropriate fields with the correct data points from the players profile
AND The user should be able to tab from field to field.  If the next field is out of view the widget should auto scroll so it is in view.

title: As a BOC User, I want to upload a signed Consent Form to a players Rule 4 Draft History widget

custom_steps: WHEN a player has been drafted and requires a consent to re-draft form, there will be an upload icon in that year's row
custom_expected:
THEN Prior to the form being uploaded, the Consent Status column will be blank for that year
AND Both Club and BOC users with the correct Admin permissions will see the upload icon in View Mode
AND Club users will only see the upload icon for players they previously drafted, in the year they drafted them
AND Clicking the upload icon will open a file browser so the user can select a file
AND When a file is uploaded, the Consent Status will update to "Pending" and there will be a paper clip icon
AND Clicking the paper clip icon will open the attached file

title: As a BOC, user I want to select 2 Domestic Amateur Profiles for merge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

AND users with domestic amateur player merge permission see a "Merge" button on the Domestic Amateur Player widget.

AND when exactly two profiles are selected in the widget, the "Merge" button is enabled.

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=domestic_amateur_players
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=merge (a similar modal already exists for International Player merge from the Registration Admin widget)

Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Player+Merge
custom_steps: WHEN two profiles are selected and Merge button is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking "Merge" will prompt the user to confirm the merge, and to select the "Master" information that they wish to keep.
 - See wireframe for layout of/information contained in message.
 
The actual merge is covered in another story

title: As a BOC user I want to merge 2 Profiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wire:

https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=merge

Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Player+Merge
custom_steps: WHEN the user has selected which Master record to keep, they can click "Merge".
custom_expected:
THEN If they choose to click "Cancel" then the modal closes and no merge is taken. The user is returned to the Dom Ama Player with no changes saved. 
AND If they click "Merge" then the system will merge the two selected profiles. 
AND A blue notification will be thrown when the merge is complete "Players successfully merged"
AND The system will need to maintain a record of the merge, and maintain BOTH player IDs as part of an audit history of the profiles. 
AND All origins will be displayed on the master record
AND The player will only appear once in the Dom Ama player widget, Club Interest List widget, Selectable Player List widget, Available Players widget, and any searches using the new "Master" information.
AND Consent forms (ama_consent) and requirements should also be moved to the appropriate copy
AND Existing scouting reports should also be moved over
AND Draft history (ama_draft_eligible) records should be moved over

*Additional merge rules covered in followup stories*
*NOTE TO QA: players can be merged multiple times - all of these merge stories will need to be tested accordingly.*

title: As a BOC User, I want to see a new Admin tab under Rule 4
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is a BOC USER
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers over the "RULE 4" tab on the left nav
custom_expected:
THEN this tab will be BOC only
AND the widgets on this tab will be:
 -- Domestic Amateur Players (removed from Players tab)
 -- Consent Form Tracking
 -- School Approvals widget
 -- Top 300 widget
AND these widgets will be removed from the Players tab
AND BOC Users will no longer see the Players tab
AND the browser tab text will say "Admin"

title: As a BOC User, I want the signing bonus slots cleared when the draft order is modified or regenerated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Pre-condition:
 -  Draft order has been generated and signing bonus pools have been loaded
custom_steps: WHEN the draft order is modified or regenerated
custom_expected:
THEN the signing bonus slots will be cleared out and adjusted to reflect the new draft order
AND users will receive a confirmation that the bonus slots were removed

title: As a BOC User, I want to change eligible year on player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC

Wireframe:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=scouting___draft
custom_steps: WHEN on a Domestic Players profile and click Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN BOC User should be able to change a domestic amateur player's eligible year from the player profile
AND If the year is moved forward, gap years should be created in the player's Rule 4 Draft History widget in their profile
AND If the year is moved backwards, any gap years that exist should be removed from the Rule 4 Draft History widget in their profile

title: As a BOC User, I want to be prevented from moving an eligible year to a previous year
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN user is on a Domestic Amateur player's profile and clicks Edit button
AND user attempts to update a player's eligible year to a draft year where the draft has already been completed
custom_expected:
THEN the User will receive a blocking message:
message will display: 
**BODY:**  "You may not update a player's eligible year to a draft year that has already been completed."
**Buttons:** Back
AND Clicking Back or the X will close the message

title: As a BOC User, I want to be prevented from editing a drafted player's eligible year prior to the signing deadline
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN user is on a Domestic Player's profile and clicks Edit button
AND user attempts to update a recently drafted player's eligible year prior to the Signing Deadline
custom_expected:
THEN the User will receive a blocking message:

**BODY:**  "You may not update this player's eligible year until the Signing Deadline has passed."
**Buttons:** Back

AND Clicking Back or the X will close the message

title: As a user, if I load a professional player via the domestic player profile I want to be redirected to the professional profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in
Make Sure Pro Player has a draft history or played domestic
custom_steps:
WHEN

@brianmentz
load a pro player up, copy their playerid
load a domestic player (any player, doesnt matter)
Once the domestic player finishes, update the player id in the URL to the pro player's and hit enter
You should be taken to the pro profile (And not the domestic with missing data)
custom_expected:
THEN


- Loading a player who's person type is professional via the domestic player link redirects the user to the professional profile.

title: As a user, if I load a domestic player via the professional player profile I want to be redirected to the domestic profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in

Make Sure Pro Player has a draft history or played domestic
custom_steps:
@brianmentz

load a domestic player up, copy their playerid
load a pro player (any player, doesnt matter)
Once the pro player finishes, update the player id in the URL to the domestic player's and hit enter
You should be taken to the domestic profile (And not the pro with missing data)
custom_expected:
THEN


- Loading a player who's person type is domestic amateur via the pro player link redirects the user to the domestic profile.

title: As a user, I want to be able to create a MN Contract for a Dom Amateur player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged into an account with DAPM Permissions (ex Clubs: ARI or DET)

Wireframe:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=info
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Create New for a Domestic Player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN Users with Edit permissions for MN Contracts see a Create New icon on Domestic Amateur profiles.
AND Users are able to launch a new Minor Contract for the player via the Create New. 
AND The Minor Contract workflow is able to be completed for the new kind of Domestic Amateur profiles, just like it was previously. This includes the information properly populating the printed MN Contract, and the contract showing up in the Rule 4 Signing Bonus utility if applicable. 
AND This needs to still work for existing international amateurs. 

*Amateur conversion to professional is covered in another story*

title: As a user I want to see a Contracts tab on an Domestic Amateur Player Profile where applicable
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged into an account with DAPM Permissions (ex Clubs: ARI or DET)
custom_steps: WHEN a Domestic Amateur player has a Minor Contract or Investigation Request or Investigation in the system
custom_expected:
THEN the users should see a "Contracts & Inv" tab for the player.
AND If the Player only has a Contract and no investigation request or investigation, the tab should just be called "Contracts"
AND Loading the Contracts & Inv tab should display the Contract History widget on top and the Investigation History widget on the bottom. 
AND If the logged in user does not have permission to see the Contract History widget or the Investigation History widget, then do not display this tab.
AND If the logged in user does not have permission to see the Contract History widget, do not display it. 
AND If the logged in user does not have permission to see the Investigation History widget, do not display it.

title: As a User, I want to Create a New Passed Over Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged into an account with DAPM Permissions (ex Clubs: ARI or DET)

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=amateur_player
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=review_match

Data Discovery:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3788437/Data+Discovery+-+Amateur+Profile+-+Info+Tab

https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789275/Data+Discovery+-+Amateur+Profile+-+Header

Rules:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3785728/Duplicate+Player+Checks
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Next button when creating a new passed over player (Domestic Amateur)
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a next button on the Create New Player widget (disabled until all required fields are filled in)
AND When the user clicks next, a required field check will be run
AND When the required field check passes, the system will perform a duplicate player check
AND This check will leverage the existing matching logic
AND If matches are found, the user will be prompted with a review match message
  -- Clicking a matching player's name will take the user to that player's profile
  -- Clicking Cancel will return the user to the Create New Player widget
  -- Clicking Ignore & Continue will take the user to a new profile and allow them to proceed with the workflow

title: As a User, I want to create a Domestic First Year MNC for a new Passed Over Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged into an account with DAPM Permissions (ex Clubs: ARI or DET)
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing a Passed Over players profile
custom_expected:
THEN There will be a create new widget on a newly created passed over player
AND Users with MNC create permissions will be able to create a Domestic First Year MNC for the player
AND Once the contract reaches terms accepted state, the player will be successfully converted into a Professional

title: As a User, I want to submit a new school to the BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged into an account with DAPM Permissions (ex Clubs: ARI or DET)

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=school_profile

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+School+Profile
custom_steps:
WHEN user is in Edit mode for a preliminary school
AND user clicks the Submit button
custom_expected:
THEN There will be a Submit button for Club users when the preliminary school is in edit mode
AND  BOC users will go straight to Approval flow (later story)
AND  Clicking Submit will run a required field check.  If any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user will receive an error message. (Global error messaging, modal, pinned errors, red highlight for missing required fields)
AND  Clicking Submit will run the school matching rule check (this story assumes there are no matches)
AND  After the rules have passed, the system updates the status of the transaction to "Submitted"  
AND  System reloads the profile in view mode, and displays a successful approve blue notification. 
AND  An Approval item should be generated for BOC Users
AND  A Pending Approval item should be generated for Club Users

title: As a User, I want to see Possible Matches when submitting and approving a new School
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged into an account with DAPM Permissions (ex Clubs: ARI or DET) or BOC

Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=matches
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=school_profile
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a new school
custom_expected:
THEN When BOC or Club User creates a new school, the system will perform a match check
AND The match check will also be performed when a BOC User approves a new school
AND Any potential matches will be displayed to the user in a pop-up that matches the provided wire
AND The names of the potential matches will be links to the school's profile
AND If there is a 100% match, there will only be a Back button on the pop-up
AND Clicking Back will return the user to their entry point
AND If there is not a 100% match, the pop-up will have both an Ignore and Continue button and a Cancel button
AND Clicking Cancel will return the user to their entry point
AND Clicking Ignore and Continue will by pass the matching message and bring the user to a new school profile

should redirect you to:

title: Domestic Amateur View Permissions
custom_steps: WHEN User has Domestic Amateur permissions
custom_expected:
THEN user will have access to the Domestic Amateur Quick Search, the Domestic Amateur Dashboard, and the Domestic AMaterur Player Profiles
AND Users without this permission will not be able to access any of the above
AND There will be a Club version and a BOC version of this permission

title: As a User, I want rules governing visibility of players for the current draft
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in (BOC or Club)

Business Rule 2.3:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3785729/Rule+4+Draft+Profiles
custom_steps: WHEN the draft year is the CURRENT YEAR
custom_expected:
- **2.3.1** Players that are submitted by Clubs that have NOT been submitted by BOC (MLSB) users for the current draft year are visible only to the Clubs that have entered the player for the current draft year, as well as the BOC.
 - **2.3.2** BOC Users will be able to see a complete list of which Clubs submitted the player for the draft.
 - **2.3.3** Club users will only be able to see that their own Club submitted the player for the draft. 
 - **2.3.4** Players that are submitted by BOC (MLSB) users for the current draft year are visible to all users and all users are able to see that the player was submitted by the BOC (MLSB)
 - **2.3.5** Players who have been submitted into the draft due to being a "Re-Draft" are also visible to all users and all users are able to see that the player is a Re-Draft.

title: As a User, I want security around Current Year profile information for players with previous year  profiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in

Business Rule 2.4:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rule+4+Draft+Profiles
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing a player that has a prior year profile and a current year Club entered profile
custom_expected:
THEN when the player is loaded by anyone other than the BOC or the submitting Club, the player's prior year draft status and Eligible Year should continue to display

** Rule 2.4.3**

title: As a User, I want rules governing the visibility of players entered into a previous draft
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in

Business Rule 2.4:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rule+4+Draft+Profiles
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing a player(s) that has passed through a draft and was NOT drafted
custom_expected:
THEN those players are searchable by anyone 

** Rule 2.4.1**

title: As a User, I want rules governing the editing of players entered into the current draft
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in

Business Rule 2.3:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rule+4+Draft+Profiles
custom_steps: WHEN user submits Player(s) into current draft year (Eligible Year = the next upcoming draft year)
custom_expected:
THEN those Player(s) are ONLY editable by the BOC until they are drafted
AND as soon as the profile is "drafted", player is editable by the Drafting Org and the BOC

** Rule 2.3.6**

title: As a User, I want players drafted in a previous draft automatically re-entered as 'Pending Eligible'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in

Business Rule 2.4:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3785729/Rule+4+Draft+Profiles
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing Player(s) that were drafted
custom_expected:
THEN those player(s) will be automatically resubmitted for the following year's draft as "Pending Eligible" after the end of the current draft
AND the players are also assigned an "Origin" of "Redraft"

 **RULE 2.4.2**

title: As a User, I want Passed Over players to be editable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in

Business Rule 2.4:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3785729/Rule+4+Draft+Profiles

Message #4:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3785742/Messages+-+Domestic+Amateur
custom_steps:
WHEN user is viewing Player(s) who have not been submitted into the current draft year
AND have a R4 Status of Passed Over
custom_expected:
THEN those player(s) will be editable by any ORG
AND Club users will always see a warning when attempting to edit a Passed Over profile
**2.4.4** Players who have not been submitted into the current draft year and have an R4 Status of Passed Over are editable by any Org. Club users will ALWAYS see a warning when attempting to edit a Passed Over profile. See Messages #4

title: As a User, I want rules governing who can edit a drafted player after the signing deadline
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in

Business Rule 2.4:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rule+4+Draft+Profiles
custom_steps:
WHEN user is viewing players who have an R4 status of Drafted for the previous draft (the one that the player was drafted in)
AND its after the Signing Deadline
custom_expected:
THEN those player(s) are only editable by the Drafting Org if the "Not Subject to Deadline" checkbox is checked on their profile
AND only applies until the rule 4 Signing Close Period Start date

**rule 2.4.6**

title: As a User, I want rules governing who can edit a drafted player prior to the signing deadline
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in

Business Rule 2.4:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rule+4+Draft+Profiles
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing Player(s) who have a R4 status of "drafted" for the immediately previous r4 draft
custom_expected:
THEN those player(s) are editable by the Drafting ORG and the BOC 

** rule 2.4.5**

title: As a BOC User, I want the system to auto-merge hard matches
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://z3s0a8.axshare.com/#p=domestic_amateur_players

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+BOC+Domestic+Amateur+Widget

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Duplicate+Player+Checks
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Player+Merge

AC:
 - The Hard Match threshold is 99%. The exception to this will be if the user checks off the "Player has a Twin" checkbox. This checkbox will effectively prevent any hard matches, and all matches will be considered a possible match.

title: As a BOC User, I want a warning message when merging players with only their school in common
custom_steps:
Message #6:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Messages+-+Domestic+Amateur

AC:
 - When a user is attempting to merge 2 players on the Domestic Amateur Player widget and School is the only 100% match, the system should prompt them with a Warning message
 - The warning should read:
  -- "You are attempting to merge two players that only have School in common."
  -- Override will allow the user to continue and merge the players
  -- Cancel will take the user back to their entry point

title: As a BOC Admin, I want updates made to the Domestic Reserve Count
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Optioned players only count during minor league season
 - Development list players count
 - 7 Day IL players count
 - Temporarily inactive players count
 - Add a new â€œReserve_Count_Flagâ€� flag for newly signed players.  
  -- Flag is set upon signing a first year contract and becoming a professional
  -- Flag will show as a BOC only check box on profile as â€œCounts against Reserve Limitâ€�, when it is checked.  BOC can uncheck the value, but once its unset it will no longer show (I think that makes the most sense, but we could change this.  If you recheck it though, the batch may well uncheck it, so this doesnâ€™t have much utility) 
  -- A nightly batch will check all flagged players to see if a player has been signed for more than 15 days, if so, the flag is set
  -- Batch will also check to see if they have any game log stats (for MiLB teams only), if so the flag is set
  -- Update the rule when signing a new MNC to display a different message if the player wonâ€™t count for 15 days, but would put the club over the limit if nothing is changed
 - Do not count other IL statuses or 60 day IL

title: Remove the under control limit for the Rookie level of play on the rosters widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN it is off season (outside of this date range: 1st day of minor lg system date until the 'Last game of WS system date + 5 days)
custom_steps: WHEN complex league is in the 'Off Season' The Complex league teams (formerly spring training facilities) were decided to be Rookie level of play, as a result we need to remove the under control limit on the Roster widget for Rookie level of play.
custom_expected: THEN do not show an 'Under Control' limit for Rookie Level of play teams

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to run a search for players that count against the Domestic Reserve limit from the MJ Summary Screen
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing the MJ Summary screen
custom_expected:
THEN each ORG will have a line item for a "Domestic Reserve List Limit"
AND the number on this line will be a hyperlink
AND clicking the hyperlink will open and execute and Advanced Search for all players in the ORG that are counting towards their Domestic Reserve Limit

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Advanced Search for Players Who Count Against the Domestic Reserve Limit
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the Advanced Search Utility
custom_steps: WHEN Users selection for Search For is Professional Player
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new "Counts Against Domestic Reserve Limit" filter added
AND the criteria for this filter will be "YES" or "NO"
AND choosing "YES" will only return players who count towards the Domestic Reserve limit
AND choosing "NO" will only return players who do not count towards the Domestic Reserve limit
AND the filter will work with other filters
